text: Xamoterol is a cardiac stimulant. It works by binding to the β1 adrenergic receptor. It is a 3rd generation adrenergic β receptor partial agonist. It provides cardiac stimulation at rest but it acts as a blocker during exercise. == References == Category:Beta1-adrenergic agonists Category:Cardiac stimulants Category:Inotropic agents Category:Morpholines Category:Phenol ethers Category:Phenols
title: Xamoterol
